ink-color:hover{color:#00dcbb!important}.coronavirus-link-color:hover{color:#e24054!important}.homepage-btn-color,.news-btn-color,.politics-btn-color,.science_and_tech-btn-color,.sports_news-btn-color,.us_news-btn-color,.weather-btn-color,.world_news-btn-color{background-color:#39f}.homepage-btn-color:hover,.news-btn-color:hover,.politics-btn-color:hover,.science_and_tech-btn-color:hover,.sports_news-btn-color:hover,.us_news-btn-color:hover,.weather-btn-color:hover,.world_news-btn-color:hover{background-color:#5cadff}.celebrity-btn-color,.entertainment-btn-color,.movies-btn-color,.music-btn-color,.tv-btn-color{background-color:#f22d2d}.celebrity-btn-color:hover,.entertainment-btn-color:hover,.movies-btn-color:hover,.music-btn-color:hover,.tv-btn-color:hover{background-color:#f45353}.business-btn-color,.careers-btn-color,.finance-btn-color,.personal_finance-btn-color,.real_estate-btn-color,.retirement-btn-color{background-color:#16cef6}.business-btn-color:hover,.careers-btn-color:hover,.finance-btn-color:hover,.personal_finance-btn-color:hover,.real_estate-btn-color:hover,.retirement-btn-color:hover{background-color:#3dd6f8}.beauty-btn-color,.food-btn-color,.lifestyle-btn-color,.living-btn-color,.shop-btn-color,.style-btn-color,.travel-btn-color,.wellness-btn-color{background-color:#fb8585}.beauty-btn-color:hover,.food-btn-color:hover,.lifestyle-btn-color:hover,.living-btn-color:hover,.shop-btn-color:hover,.style-btn-color:hover,.travel-btn-color:hover,.wellness-btn-color:hover{background-color:#fcadad}.cars-btn-color{background-color:#00b398}.cars-btn-color:hover{background-color:#00dcbb}.coronavirus-btn-color{background-color:#d82138}.coronavirus-btn-color:hover{background-color:#e24054}.m-unified-player .video-player{position:relative;height:350px}.m-unified-player.unified_player_video,.m-unified-player.unified_player_video_show{background-color:#111;clear:both;overflow:hidden;color:#fff;font-family:_Larsseit,Larsseit,Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;text-align:left}.m-unified-player.unified_player_video .wrapper,.m-unified-player.unified_player_video_show .wrapper{margin:0 auto;padding:25px;display:flex;max-width:1440px}@media screen and (max-width:753px){.m-unified-player.unified_player_video .wrapper,.m-unified-player.unified_player_video_show .wrapper{padding:25px 0}}.m-unified-player.unified_player_video .wrapper .player,.m-unified-player.unified_player_video_show .wrapper .player{width:100%}.m-unified-player.unified_player_video .wrapper .player
